name: Lightning
effect: Deal 3 damage to any target.

name: Stricken
effect: Tap target creature.

name: Revive
effect: Return a creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Burst
effect: Create a 1/1 Punk creature token.

name: Tempest
effect: Return a creature from the battlefield to its owners hand.

name: Assault
effect: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

name: Pandemonium
effect: Exchange control of two target creatures.

name: Rage
effect: Creatures you control get +1 Power until end of turn.

name: Sorrow
effect: Creatures your opponents control get -2 Power until end of turn.

name: Frost
effect: Tap all creatures controlled by target opponent. They don't untap at the beginning of their controller's next turn.

name: Hypnosis
effect: Gain control of target creature until the end of turn.

name: Vortex
effect: Remove target permanent from the game.

name: Ice
effect: Tap target creature. Draw a card.

name: Fire
effect: Deal 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

name: Fireball
effect: Deal 5 damage to target creature

name: Wall
effect: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Infuriate
effect: Counter target spell.

name: Invisibility
effect: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

name: Fury
effect: Deal 1 damage to each creature.

name: Frenzy
effect: Deal 2 damage to each creature.

name: Stun
effect: Counter target spell unless its controller discards a card or sacrifices a permanent.

name: Heal
effect: Gain 4 life.

name: Reanimate
effect: Return a creature from a graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Freeze
effect: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap at the beginning of its controller's next turn.

name: Burn
effect: Deal 3 damage to target player.

name: Gravitation
effect: Draw 2 cards.

name: Gale
effect: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand.

name: Torment
effect: Each opponent discards a card

name: Maelstrom
effect: Return all creatures to their owner's hands.
